price: Whoever turns away from it will bear a heavy burden on the Day of Resurrection,
arabic: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
